manifest:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:versionCode="15" android:versionName="1.8.9.5" package="com.mohammadag.colouredstatusbar" platformBuildVersionCode="21" platformBuildVersionName="5.0.1-1624448">
	<uses-sdk android:minSdkVersion="15" android:targetSdkVersion="19" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" />
	<android:uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" android:maxSdkVersion="18" />
	<application android:theme="resourceId:0x7f0c0001" android:label="Tinted Status Bar" android:icon="res/drawable-mdpi-v4/ic_launcher.png" android:allowBackup="true">
		<activity android:label="Per app tints" android:name="com.mohammadag.colouredstatusbar.activities.PackageListActivity" android:configChanges="0x480">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="com.mohammadag.colouredstatusbar.PER_APP_SETTINGS" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:label="Tinted Status Bar" android:name="com.mohammadag.colouredstatusbar.activities.SettingsActivity" />
		<activity-alias android:name="com.mohammadag.colouredstatusbar.MainActivity" android:targetActivity="com.mohammadag.colouredstatusbar.activities.SettingsActivity">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity-alias>
		<activity android:label="Contributors" android:name="com.mohammadag.colouredstatusbar.activities.ContributorsActivity">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="com.mohammadag.colouredstatusbar.SHOW_CONTRIBUTORS" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<meta-data android:name="xposedmodule" android:value="true" />
		<meta-data android:name="xposedminversion" android:value="54+" />
		<meta-data android:name="xposeddescription" android:value="Tint the status bar based on current activity" />
		<activity android:label="Tinted Status Bar Settings" android:name="com.mohammadag.colouredstatusbar.activities.ApplicationSettings" />
		<activity android:name="com.mohammadag.colouredstatusbar.activities.ColorPickerActivity" />
		<activity android:name="com.mohammadag.colouredstatusbar.activities.ScreenColorPickerActivity" android:exported="true" android:launchMode="singleInstance" />
		<activity android:name="com.mohammadag.colouredstatusbar.activities.ActivitesListActivity" android:configChanges="0x480" />
		<activity android:label="Plugins" android:name="com.mohammadag.colouredstatusbar.activities.PluginDownloaderActivity">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="com.mohammadag.colouredstatusbar.DOWNLOAD_PLUGINS" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<receiver android:name="com.mohammadag.colouredstatusbar.PackageChangedReceiver" android:exported="false">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.PACKAGE_ADDED" />
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.PACKAGE_CHANGED" />
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.PACKAGE_REMOVED" />
				<data android:scheme="package" />
			</intent-filter>
		</receiver>
	</application>
</manifest>
